name: Berkeley
description: Berkeley is rumored to be the super-potent botany project of a student at the prestigious California university of the same name. This strain is certainly an overachiever with its extremely high THC content and lightning fast flowering timeâ€”as short as 4 weeks! Berkeley is known to give energetic, buzzy effects that are typical of sativas. This strain will stimulate your mind, but beware, it may cause anxiety for some users.
